vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.15.8;
son of: Abijah (H0029I); married to Azubah (H5806);
father of: Jehoshaphat (H3092I); also called Asaph at Mat.1.7,8;
Also named: Asa<\i> (Ἀσά "Asaph" G0760)
§ Asa = "healer: injurious (?)"
1) king of Judah, son of Abijam, father of Jehoshaphat
2) a Levite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Abías; rey de Judá (911/10-870/69); (b)   padre de Berequías; levita; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞撒 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "醫治者(?)"
1) 猶大國的王, 亞比央的兒子, 約沙法的父親
2) 一個利末人 (代上 9:16)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚撒 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "医治者(?)"
1) 犹大国的王, 亚比央的儿子, 约沙法的父亲
2) 一个利末人 (代上 9:16)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.16;
son of: Elkanah (H0511K);
father of: Berechiah (H1296I)
§ Asa = "healer: injurious (?)"
1) king of Judah, son of Abijam, father of Jehoshaphat
2) a Levite
